item.title: Zelenskyy, European leaders to meet with Trump on Ukraine at White House
item.description: President Trump is hosting Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy and several European leaders at the White House on Monday. Follow live updates.

item.title: Amazon Books reveals best cookbooks of the year so far
item.description: Amazon Books editorial director Sarah Gelman shares her top cookbook picks of 2025.

item.title: Leukemia survivors reunite at medical school and 102-year-old shines on baseball diamond
item.description: In this "Dear David" episode, David Begnaud shares the reunion of Ellie Koerner and Dawson Nailor, childhood leukemia survivors now in medical school ...

item.title: Magicians Penn Jillette and Teller celebrate 50 years with Radio City Music Hall performance
item.description: Legendary magicians Penn Jillette and Teller mark five decades together with a milestone show at Radio City Music Hall, part of their anniversary tour...

item.title: Pennsylvania superintendent makes violins for students to cut school costs
item.description: As part of back-to-school season, a Pennsylvania superintendent is building violins in her office to save families hundreds in rental fees.
